original_text: And on the doors of the nave were carved cherubim and palm trees, such as were carved on the walls. And there was a canopy of wood in front of the vestibule outside.
korean_text: 이 성전 문에 그룹과 종려나무를 새겼는데 벽에 있는 것과 같고 현관 앞에는 나무 디딤판이 있으며

sentences.original_text: And on the doors of the nave were carved cherubim and palm trees
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성전 본당 문에는 그룹과 종려나무가 새겨졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: such as were carved on the walls
And there was a canopy of wood
in front of the vestibule outside
